meta.name: keywords
meta.content: JiBX schema library, XML Java Binding, XML, Java, JiBX, jibx.org, Open Source

document.body:
The JiBX Schema Library.
Here are the maven and OSGi locations for these schema bindings.
jibx.org
Here are the instructions for contributing your schema to the schema library.
Our OSGi obr repository index is located at: http://jibx.org/repository.xml
jibx.org schema library. A collection of sample schema binding projects.
Schema site:
jibx
Developer: Don Corley don@tourgeek.com
Schema Library - jibx.org - Person Schema
Schema Library - jibx.org - Address Schema
Schema Library - jibx.org - Company Schema
Schema Library - jibx.org - Person Schema Test
Schema Library - jibx.org - Address Schema Test
Schema Library - jibx.org - Company Schema Test
Schema Library - jibx.org - Schema Test
org.jibx.sampleschema.person - A schema binding project using a very simple schema.
<dependency> <groupId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx</groupId> <artifactId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.person</artifactId> <version>1.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency>
Java package: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.person
Java jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.person-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
OSGi name: Schema Library - jibx.org - Person Schema
OSGi symbolic name: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.person@1.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Source code jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.person-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-sources.jar
Javadoc jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.person-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-javadoc.jar
Schema location: http://www.jibx.org/sampleschema/person.xsd
org.jibx.sampleschema.address - A schema binding project using a very simple schema which has a base schema. The base schema is retrieved from the org.jibx.sampleschema.person artifact.
<dependency> <groupId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx</groupId> <artifactId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.address</artifactId> <version>1.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency>
Java package: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.address
Java jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.address-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
OSGi name: Schema Library - jibx.org - Address Schema
OSGi symbolic name: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.address@1.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Source code jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.address-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-sources.jar
Javadoc jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.address-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-javadoc.jar
Schema location: http://www.jibx.org/sampleschema/address.xsd
org.jibx.sampleschema.company - A schema binding project using a simple schema which has a base schema. The base schema is retrieved from the org.jibx.sampleschema.address artifact which also has a base schema.
<dependency> <groupId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx</groupId> <artifactId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.company</artifactId> <version>1.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency>
Java package: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.company
Java jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.company-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
OSGi name: Schema Library - jibx.org - Company Schema
OSGi symbolic name: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.company@1.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Source code jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.company-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-sources.jar
Javadoc jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.sampleschema.company-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-javadoc.jar
Schema location: http://www.jibx.org/sampleschema/company.xsd
Test person schema. <dependency> <groupId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test</groupId> <artifactId>org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.person</artifactId> <version>1.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency>
Java package: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.person
Java jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.person-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
OSGi name: Schema Library - jibx.org - Person Schema Test
OSGi symbolic name: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.person@1.0.1-SNAPSHOT

Javadoc jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.person-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-javadoc.jar

Java package: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.company
Java jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.company-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
OSGi name: Schema Library - jibx.org - Company Schema Test
OSGi symbolic name: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.company@1.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Source code jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.company-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-sources.jar
Javadoc jar: org.jibx.schema.org.jibx.test.company-1.0.1-SNAPSHOT-javadoc.jar
